Name: Maniac Path
About the game: Maniac Path - this 2D game in which you have to kill a lot of your victims. You will have at hand a variety of weapons (knife, shotgun, machine gun), which you will do your dirty deeds. Run, kill, run away, ride a car and crush your victims while driving. Fly through the sky on certain levels. Fight with a big shot boss. In a peaceful city where peace and serenity rule, a maniac escapes to freedom. You have to go through the path of a brutal killer who, driven by instinct, roams the streets in search of victims. You will be confronted by police armed not only with batons. Can you handle the dark mission? Your task changes frequently, but the main goal is to kill! Key features: - Interesting gameplay - Playing for a maniac - Changing gameplay - Brutal murder - Cool soundtracks - Achievements!
